title: Improving Chlorine Residual Predictions in Water Distribution Systems using Recurrent Neural Networks
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00329B, Paper
Ammar Riyadh, Anas Chaaban, Abdullah Zayat, Nicolas M Peleato
The management of water quality in distribution systems is a pervasive challenge. A high degree of uncertainty in water demand, reaction rates, and condition of the pipe networks results in...
